title: DON’T BE SURPRISED IF GOVT. WANTS TO MAKE PARLIAMENT AN AUTHORITY: GAYANTHA
content: September 20, 2010: It is not surprising if the government took steps to convert the parliament into an authority as well, says parliamentarian Gayantha Karunathilaka, media spokesman of the United National Party (UNP). He expressed these views while addressing a media briefing at the Opposition leader’s office this morning. “The Colombo Municipal Council has been…
